page.title: 14A Marchwood Fisherman
page.content: When we got to Magazine Creek, a local fisherman was working on his boat. It has a diesel engine. When he is not working on his boat he is out in it catching fish. Yesterday he was catching eels. He caught 20 in the morning. He is 45 years old & has been a fisherman for many years. He has two boats. Sometimes he catches clams & sometimes fish that swim. If he cannot make a living fishing he works on motor cars. He loves doing fishing most of all. {The Booking Clerk}: The booking clerk gets up at 5.30 & sometimes works every day of the week because the railways are short staffed. When he has days off he likes to travel around on trains. If people come to Totton station when the office is locked they buy tickets on the train.
